Discover Bvlgari summer gifts:

node.text:
Like a portal into a fantastical world, the architecture of the Eternal City gives our muses a gateway into a dreamlike Rome. Watch as @lilyaldridge, @zendaya, @vittoria, and @lalalalisa_m describe what it was like to peer into the wonder of Magnifica and create Bvlgari’s ethereal Brand Campaign film.
.
.
Director & photographer: @txemayeste
Starring #Lisa #Zendaya #LilyAldridge #VittoriaCeretti for Bvlgari
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #DreamMagnificence #LifeIsMagnificent

node.text:
In this brief look behind the scenes we take you from Italy’s capital to its fashion capital. Inside the Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II, watch as every second of the show is planned out and meticulously brought to life, celebrating the film’s true stars — the Magnifica High Jewelry collection. 
.
.
Production company @illmatic_film_group_company 
Executive producer @jacopo.pica 
Directed by @gooooooooooooooooooooofy
Producer @annaliasilecchia 
Photographer (cover) @gabrieldelachapelle 
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry  #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica

node.title: 'Magnifica' Opera d’Arte — From Rome to Milan.

node.text:
The vibrant inspiration of Rome returns to lift the hearts of the world. Shining into Italy’s fashion capital like a blinding ray of sunshine, Bvlgari presents its most exquisite High Jewelry collection to date. More than the launch of unparalleled works of jewelry craft, this is a resplendent celebration of rebirth. Honored through magnificent muses, music, and Milan, Bvlgari unveils the Magnifica High Jewelry collection at the heart of the Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II.
.
.
Models: @vittoria, @lilyaldridge @heconghc, @solangesmith and @blesnyaminher 
Special Guests: @andreabocelliofficial @beatricevenezi 
.
.
Project by @oma.eu
Director @tommaso.ottomano
DOP @mrcodepa
Stylist @sagliogeraldine (studio) @alicegentilucci (galleria)
Music @guazzonemarco 
Production @studio.april
. 
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica #Milan

node.text:
With two career GRAMMY nominations, seven studio albums, and nearly 3bn streams to his name, this live DJ set from @steveaoki promises to be spectacular. To celebrate the launch of the Bvlgari Aluminium Steve Aoki Special Edition watch, Bvlgari presents Steve Aoki live. Enjoy.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #BvlgariAluminium #SteveAoki #LiveConcert #SpecialGuestDJ

node.text:
In honor of the awards, @luxurylaw lays down the law on styling and jewelry for the Oscars. Known as the Image Architect, the fiercely talented super-stylist breaks down how he gets stars like @zendaya red carpet ready. This masterclass also gives you an up-close look at some stunning Bvlgari High Jewelry creations – including the exclusive Magnifica pieces Law used to create Zendaya’s jewelry story for this year's Academy Awards. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #93rdAcademyAwards #AcademyAwards #TheOscars #StarsInBvlgari

node.title: MASTERCLASS BY BVLGARI WITH LAW ROACH

node.text:
To our inspiration. To our incredible home. To the city of countless ancient adventures. To the city of the new stories yet to be lived and told. Celebrate the eternal city allure through the pages of “Bvlgari Roma: Travel Tales for Beauty Lovers” a one-of-a-kind guide to Rome’s renowned glamour.

Happy birthday Rome!

Directed by @oliverhl 
Aerial @snils @gianmarco.gabriele 
Music @federicoderoni 

#Bvlgari #Heritage #History #Roma #NataleDiRoma

node.text:
Unlocking the secrets of Serpenti.
The Bvlgari Watches Creative Director unravels the mystery of this breathtaking High Jewelry watch – the Serpenti Misteriosi Cleopatra. Listen as Fabrizio Buonamassa describes the intricacies of designing a watch within a pure High Jewelry piece, the sheer number of gemstones set into its hexagonal scales, and the unique way this intriguing Bvlgari creation fastens around the wrist. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #BvlgariHighJewelry #Serpenti #SerpentiMisteriosiCleopatra #ColorTreasures #WatchesAndWonders2021

node.text:
A perfect synergy of creative energies.
Listen as Bvlgari Watches Creative Director, Fabrizio Buonamassa, discusses working with internationally renowned architect, @tadao.ando. Together, they created a timepiece that harmonizes a Japanese expression of the nature of time with uniquely Italian codes of design.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #OctoFinissimo #TadaoAndoLimitedSeries #EsteticaDellaMeccanica #WatchesAndWonders2021

node.text:
In this exclusive gemstone masterclass, Bvlgari Creative Director, @lucia_silvestri, guides you through the first chapter of the Maison’s Color Journeys experience – the Paraiba High Jewelry collection. Watch as Lucia shows you dazzling Paraiba tourmaline gems and the breathtaking High Jewelry creations Bvlgari crafts then into. 

#Bvlgari #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariColorJourneys #Paraiba  #Masterclass

node.text:
With every record-breaking year, Bvlgari advances its expertise in the design and manufacture of Haute Horology timepieces. Listen as Bvlgari Watches Creative Director, Fabrizio Buonamassa, shares his thoughts on the past triumphs of the Octo Finissimo collection – and what the new perpetual calendar means for the evolution of the saga.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #OctoFinissimo #EsteticaDellaMeccanica #WatchesAndWonders2021

node.text:
Serpenti’s metamorphosis comes to life through a collection of gem-inspired nuances and playful homages to Bvlgari’s iconography. Listen to @marykatrantzou explain the inspiration behind her interpretation of Serpenti, manifested through a combination of print, three-dimensional embroidery, and jewelry-like design flair.
.
.
Video by @panosdavios @10artistsmanagement
.
#Bvlgari #Serpenti #BvlgariAccessories #SerpentiMetamorphosis
#MaryKatrantzou #MaryKatrantzouXBvlgari #SerpentiThroughTheEyesOfMaryKatrantzou

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by BVLGARI Official on July 20, 2021. May be an image of purse and saddle-stitched leather.

node.text:
Summer in the bag.
With a light and summery texture, the Bvlgari Logo Tote Bag combines practicality with panache. And, in homage to Bvlgari’s jewelry heritage, this luscious Ivory Opal bag also features gold-plated brass chain inserts. 
.
.
Photographer: @vanmosseveldeplusn
Stylist: @agata_belcen
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariAccessories #MagnificentSummer #BvlgariSummer

node.text:
Serpenti’s expression of summer.
Watch as @blesnyaminher matches her fresh summer look with the Serpenti Forever Crossbody Bag. Translating Bvlgari’s mastery of color into this luminous Ivory Opal texture, Serpenti’s transformation includes this bold Bvlgari Maxi Chain.
.
.
video by @spkmore
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariAccessories #SerpentiForever #MagnificentSummer #BvlgariSummer

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by BVLGARI Official on July 19, 2021. May be an image of sunglasses.

node.text:
Serpenti reveals its True Colors.
Bvlgari’s enigmatic emblem lends its hexagonal scale motif to these sublime True Colors sunglasses. Wearing these colorful, enamel-scale-adorned summer accessories, @blesnyaminher reaffirms Serpenti’s reputation as the icon of infinite metamorphoses.
.
.
Photographer: @vanmosseveldeplusn
Stylist: @agata_belcen
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariAccessories #Serpenti #MagnificentSummer #BvlgariSummer

node.text:
Double or everything. 
Mother-of-pearl meets precious pavé diamonds in this elegant fusion of culture and modernity. This BVLGARI BVLGARI necklace makes a double statement, with each side of its versatile design boasting a different precious setting.
.
.
Photographer: @vanmosseveldeplusn
Stylist: @agata_belcen
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariBvlgari #MagnificentSummer #BvlgariSummer

node.text:
Infinite options. 
A rendezvous under the exuberant sun is just one of the delights of summer — and this BVLGARI BVLGARI necklace gives you a styling option for every occasion. Half mother-of-pearl, half blinding pave diamonds, 100% Bvlgari. Shop now.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariBvlgari #MagnificentSummer #BvlgariSummer

Essential summer jewelry.
Like the golden rays of the sun, this blinding Bvlgari jewelry duo shines with contemporary class in bold rose gold. This BVLGARI BVLGARI Essential ring and bracelet pairing feature diamonds as part of their unique designs.
.
.
Photographer: @vanmosseveldeplusn
Stylist: @agata_belcen
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariBvlgari #MagnificentSummer #BvlgariSummer

@chiaraferragni, @ester_exposito, @karenwazen, @hiba_abouk_, Li Meng, @anna_vrc, @adeleexarchopoulos and @francoiscivilofficiel glimmer brightly in the limelight of this year’s Cannes Film Festival — thanks to these opulent jewelry creations crafted by the Roman jeweler. 

.

.

node.text:
Bvlgari creates change at Cannes.
At this year’s Cannes Festival, Bvlgari showed its support for @natasupernova’s Naked Heart Foundation at a special charity gala hosted by @alisa___volskaya. The brand donated a never-before-seen B.zero1 necklace and an exclusive trip to Bvlgari’s Bali Resort, for auction. Among those attending were @officialnievesa, @alejandrospeitzer, @solangesmith, @kortajarenajon, @xeniaadonts, @sashaluss, @mark.limited, @juleshough, and @tamara — with a special live performance by @darrencriss.
.
.
Photographer @germanlarkin 
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #StarsInBvlgari #CannesFilmFestival #Cannes2021 #TheNakedHeartFoundation

node.text:
Stars in Bvlgari at Cannes.
@adeleexarchopoulos, @lenamahfouf, @svevaalviti, and @officialnievesa prove you need some exuberant Bvlgari jewelry before you’re truly ready for the Cannes red carpet. Also seen here at this year’s film festival, @alejandrospeitzer, and @kortajarenajon hit the red carpet with perfect timing — thanks to these distinguished Octo Finissimo timepieces. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #StarsInBvlgari #CannesFilmFestival #Cannes2021

Star studded. 
This multitalented ensemble represents talent at its boldest. From creative entrepreneur @lukasabbat, to actor @willpeltz, and model @kailandmorris — it’s no wonder each star selects B.zero1 to accentuate the expression of their unique style. 
.
.

From Rome to Paris.
In bold celebration of her individual esthetic, @parisjackson basks in the Roman exuberance of B.zero1 Rock. The precious stones that adorn her 18 kt white gold necklace match the pavé diamonds set into the spiral of this iconic ring.
.

The power of B.zero1. 
@keithpowers powers up his summer style, @milesmcmillan makes an icon his own, and @reillypatton_ adds extra audacity to his look. With these necklaces, bracelets, and rings, B.zero1 reaffirms its title as Bvlgari’s icon of true individuality.
